body: @gchanan, do you know why we have both `static inline void maybe_wrap_dims(std::vector<int64_t>& dims, int64_t dim_post_expr)` (in WrapDimUtils.h) and `static inline int64_t maybe_wrap_dim(int64_t dim, int64_t dim_post_expr, bool wrap_scalar=true)` (in core/WrapDimMinimal.h)?
body_html: @gchanan, do you know why we have both static inline void maybe_wrap_dims(std::vector<int64_t>& dims, int64_t dim_post_expr) (in WrapDimUtils.h) and static inline int64_t maybe_wrap_dim(int64_t dim, int64_t dim_post_expr, bool wrap_scalar=true) (in core/WrapDimMinimal.h)?
body_text: @gchanan, do you know why we have both static inline void maybe_wrap_dims(std::vector<int64_t>& dims, int64_t dim_post_expr) (in WrapDimUtils.h) and static inline int64_t maybe_wrap_dim(int64_t dim, int64_t dim_post_expr, bool wrap_scalar=true) (in core/WrapDimMinimal.h)?
